dt-api.name: columns().every()
dt-api.summary: Iterate over each selected column, with the function context set to be the column in question.

type.parameter:
Function to execute for every column selected. The function's content is set to be an API instance for the column in question.
As of DataTables 1.10.8 the function is passed the following parameters:
1. Column index 2. Table loop counter 3. Column loop counter 4. Undefined (present only for consistency)
No return value is expected or acted upon.
type.returns: DataTables API instance of the selected columns.

example.title: Add a filter for each column in the table to the footer
Build a search for each column with a `select-filter` class.
Sum all columns which have a class of `.sum` and put the sum into its footer cell
